title: Телохранители
overview: Yashcher, Yurok and Tucha decide to make money on a commercial tournament in fights without rules before flying to the World Championship, which is why they are excluded from the national team. The boxers have dinner in a restaurant in the capital, where a conflict ensues between them and the protection of an influential lawyer. Having demonstrated their professional skills, the heroes find themselves in the police. Impressed by their skill, the lawyer offers the boxers a deal: go to prison or become his bodyguards.
